value:
These clothes are great for showing
off my muscles! I wish my little sis
and grandpa could see me in this!

I'm one of the best eaters around!
Bring me meat! Bring me fish! I'll take
on any challenge!

Hey, summoner. What're you up to?
Wanna go find some food?

Hah! Grah! Yah! Hrmph! ...Whew!
I gotta keep training to get stronger.
Can't let these muscles relax!

All right, here's what you do. First,
grab a sack and fill it with rocks. Then
you swing it round and round, got it?$k$pHuh? What's wrong? I thought you
were looking for a new exercise!

Hey! You're $Nu!
This is for you. It's from
your old pal $Nf!

Grraaahhh! I'm fired up! My muscles
are happy, and when they're happy,
I'm happy too! Check 'em out!

I gotta keep working to get bigger,
stronger muscles!

My poor muscles... I can't keep letting
them down...
For me? Thanks!

My name's Raphael Kirsten! I'm not
really sure what this festival's about,
but I hear the food's pretty good!

I hear there's a country called Plegia,
and that's where these clothes come
from. The material is so thin though!$k$pDo you think they get cold in winter?
And what kinds of food do you think
they eat? I bet it's tasty...$k$pOh! I gotta tell my little sis about this
festival! She'd love it here! Maybe I
can write a letter and send a gift...$k$pWhat's something Maya would like?
I'm no good at picking out gifts. I'm
great with muscles! But bad at gifts...$k$pUgh. All this thinking's worked up my
appetite. C'mon, let's go find
something to fill our stomachs!
だあっ
どえいっ
ぐほっ
That hurts, ya know!
Sorry about this!
Curse you!
Doing my best!
Look out below!
Maya...I'm sorry.
Phew
Someone said they wear these clothes in a country called Plegia, but... I've never heard of the place.
Dagh?! Hey now! Don't sneak up on me like that!
I don't even know what this festival is about, but I heard there was a feast!
What do people eat in the desert? I hope it's meat...
I like these Plegia clothes. They really show off my muscles, huh?
I gotta become a proper knight so I can take care of my little sis!
Hey, I got an idea! Let's have a muscle festival next time!
Leave it to me!
I can't wait!
Yeah!
